entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to debug Blazor from Vscode #46222
  • Allow `NameClaimType`/`RoleClaimType` to be configured with the authentication configuration provider #46221
  • Unable to Build from Source #46219
  • Project option not working correctly for the `user-jwts` command #46218
  • Server-side Blazor: render loop and update stops responding #46217

Closed

  • @microsoft/signalr - HubConnection onclose event causing app crash on iOS devices. #44564
  • Array will allocate less and little faster when creating RequestDelegateFactoryOptions in CreateRDFOptions #46010
    8.0-preview2
  • API proposal: enable configuring connection timeouts in HubConnectionBuilder #44742
    8.0-preview1
  • Blazor WASM PWA -> offline mode is not loading any resources #46210
  • Consider moving Kestrel shared source test attributes to src\Shared #36035
    8.0-preview1
  • QuickGrid Filtering Not Refreshing Property #46187
  • Add chrome.identity support for WebAssembly auth #46203
  • Importing Framer website to Blazor is not successfull #46211
  • Custom RemoteAuthenticationHandler Exceptions #46212
  • Blazor User.Identity seems to be null #46102
  • Blazor Custom elements not working with .net 7 Blazor Server #46091
  • Blazor WASM deployed to Cloudfront on url downloads 70 dlls, but Cloudfront url only downloads 20 #46152

PullRequests

Created

  • Evaluate BoundProperties when inferring BindindSource #46228
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Consistently return StringValues.Empty instead of default for missing headers #46226
    area-runtime
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup #46225
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Implement RouteHandlerServices.Map and use in RequestDelegateGenerator #46180
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Added withServerTimeout and withKeepAliveInterval to HubConnectionBuilder for java client #46172
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `356fc30` to `ec25eea` #46214
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Move Kestrel shared source to src\Shared #46112
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [blazor][wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #46132
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't depend on source-build job while it isn't running #46220
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Delete duplicate define #46202
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix route syntax highlighting parameter color #46208
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add limit to length of IdentityUser.PhoneNumber. #45892
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Changed docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com Issue: #44175 #46206
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Named Pipe] Check for pipe broken on WaitConnectionAsync #46182
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding STJ Polymorphism to Result Types #46008
    area-web-frameworks
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Avoid UnobservedTaskExceptions when getting an error in server to client streaming #46198
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [SignalR] [Java] Log 'WebSocket stopped' once #43532
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • Make it easy to produce a 2.1 build without prodcon #46197
    2.1.x
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `af74f44` to `83c2bdc` #46122
    area-infrastructure
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    area-web-frameworks
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Add RegexOptions.Compiled option to RegexRouteConstraint #46192
    area-mvc, community-contribution
